casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. UTILITIES COMMISSION
v.
ATTORNEY GENERAL 271A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 15, 2019 Margaret A. Force, Teresa L. Townsend, Assistant Attorney Generals, Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, Jennifer T. Harrod, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitor General, for Stein, Josh (Attorney General). Kiran H. Mehta, Molly Leigh McIntosh, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Duke Energy Progress, LLC. Matthew D. Quinn, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Sierra Club. David T. Drooz, Staff Attorney, Lucy E. Edmondson, Staff Attorney, Raleigh, for Public Staff - N.C. Utilities Commission. James P. West, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Fayetteville Public Works Commission. Kyle J. Smith, Attorney at Law, for Department of Defense/Federal Executive Agencies.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of April 2019 to admit Bridget M. Lee Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of April 2019."
